title: Intamenya Irira k'umuziro
meaning: Kuba utazi cg udafite amakuru ahagije ku kintu bikongerera ibyago byo gukora amakosa menshi.
application: Iyo umuntu ari kwishora mu byo atazi.

title: Umushonji arota arya
meaning: Icyo umuntu yifuza akenshi aba ashaka ko kiba impamo.
application: Iyo wumva umuntu yahinduwe imbata n'ibyo ashaka ko biba.

title: Akabura ntikaboneke n'Inyina w'Umuntu
application: Kwibutsa umuntu agaciro ka nyina umubyara cyangwa umubyeyi umurera.

title: Kuvuga biranoga, gukora bikaguma
meaning: Biroroshye kugira ibitekerezo, ukanabitanga ariko kubishyira mu bikorwa biragora.
application: Iyo wumva umuntu yashyize imbaraga mu jora ibyabandi bakoze.

title: Ubwenge bwari bwiza iyo butagirwa na bose
meaning: Ntugashuke cyangwa ngo ubeshye abandi nkaho batabasha ku kuvumbura
application: Iyo uvumbuye k'Umuntu ashaka ku guhenda ubwenge.
